Module org.example.eiscuno
Package org.example.eiscuno.model.game

Interface IGameUno

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameUno
public interface IGameUno
Interface representing the Uno game functionality.

  • Method Details

    • startGame

      void startGame()
      Starts the Uno game.

    • eatCard

      void eatCard(Player player, int numberOfCards)
      Makes a player draw a specified number of cards from the deck.
      Parameters:
      player - the player who will draw the cards
      numberOfCards - the number of cards to be drawn

    • playCard

      void playCard(Card card)
      Plays a card in the game, adding it to the table.
      Parameters:
      card - the card to be played

    • haveSungOne

      void haveSungOne(String playerWhoSang)
      Handles the action when a player shouts "Uno".
      Parameters:
      playerWhoSang - the identifier of the player who shouted "Uno"

    • getCurrentVisibleCardsHumanPlayer

      Card[] getCurrentVisibleCardsHumanPlayer(int posInitCardToShow)
      Retrieves the current visible cards of the human player starting from a specific position.
      Parameters:
      posInitCardToShow - the starting position of the cards to be shown
      Returns:
      an array of cards that are currently visible to the human player

    • isGameOver

      Boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise
